talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Special Sentry Louis$
What are you doing here? Can’t you see there’s a Nest here now?
If the Child Lord sees you, you’ll be dead meat.
So don’t be foolhardy and leave now.

$Special Sentry Louis$
Hey, why do you keep approaching?
Didn’t you hear what I just said? I have no choice but to attack you if you come any closer!
